DESCRIPTION:

The award-winning game series returns in its 20th anniversary with new features. In PES 2016 game features many new and improved features that will certainly raise the bar once again among all the football games, and will preserve the title "Best sports simulator." PES 2016 - The Official Video Game of the UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League and UEFA Super Cup. Celebrate the 20th anniversary of the series with the best football simulation ever. I love the past, to play for the future!
Features:
"The League of the masters - completely redone, from the presentation to the management team

"The new night lighting and exterior styling of players thanks to the GPU Fox Engine

"Movement of people - 3 times more kinds of animations for players and goalkeepers

"Dynamically change the weather - at any point in the game may start rain

"Improved intelligence team - the behavior of individual players and the entire team as a whole is now much more reasonable

Features repack:
